content: in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 6 sts drip 7 chain 6 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 3 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into the next st 6 sts drip 8 chain 7 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 4 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 8 sts *fasten_off link to video https //youtu be/jcae3fopvwi if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
